divs: sighting detailsthis was watched by 8 to 10 people for 20 minutes. the best video went untaped but it was taped near the end of the event for a good 2 minutes of strange weather or whatever this may have been. please tell me because i have never seen anything like this. it is on youtube: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=1iage9f0k1q
Summary: Constant light beams eminating from the top of thunderhead changing direction every 15 to 20 seconds for many minutes.
